What event sparked fan edits and comments dedicated to TikTok CEO Shou Zi Chew?
His testimony to Congress
Which committee did Shou Zi Chew testify in front of?
The House Energy and Commerce Committee
How many monthly users does TikTok have in the United States?
150 million
What is the main concern of lawmakers surrounding TikTok?
User safety, data privacy, and national security
How many bills are currently in Congress that could affect American access to TikTok?
Three
What is the name of the new subsidiary that Chew mentioned during his testimony to allow TikTok to remain active in the US?
Project Texas
What was the criticism leveled at the congressional hearing by a TikTok representative?
Political grandstanding
How many influencers did TikTok sponsor to participate in a demonstration on Capitol Hill?
More than 30
How many followers did Shou Zi Chew's personal TikTok account have before his testimony?
Just under 18,000
How many new followers did Chew's TikTok account gain since his testimony?
More than 70,000
